// src/utils/spotify.js
import axios from'axios';const clientId='7c6b8a3ea0e3406b9d8e5974be8b442b';const clientSecret='49aa02d0a85249279ae8ab73bbef28f5';const getToken=async()=>{const response=await axios.post('https://accounts.spotify.com/api/token',null,{headers:{'Content-Type':'application/x-www-form-urlencoded','Authorization':"Basic ".concat(btoa("".concat(clientId,":").concat(clientSecret)))},params:{grant_type:'client_credentials'}});return response.data.access_token;};const getTopTracks=async()=>{const token=await getToken();const response=await axios.get('https://api.spotify.com/v1/playlists/37i9dQZEVXbMDoHDwVN2tF/tracks',{headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token)},params:{market:'US',limit:100}});return response.data.items;};export{getTopTracks};
